content: {A豆豆眼}...W-Was I bein' a show-off just now?
info: 云果小故事-百香果闲聊_云果故事线

content: Well mah, really I just wanted Gran'mama to know that, I've found a very, very wonderful planet to live on, and have met a super, awesome, wonderful neighbor.
info: 云果小故事-百香果闲聊_云果故事线

content: <style=PlayerName>{玩家昵称}</style>, I was thinkin' mah... maybe I'll send Gran'mama some passion fruit. She'd be so excited to get seeds from a plant she's never seen.
info: 云果小故事-百香果闲聊_云果故事线

content: {A得意}And well...{短暂停} Now that I know somethin' she doesn't, guess it's finally my turn to teach her somethin'~!
info: 云果小故事-百香果闲聊_云果故事线

content: And that I can stand on my own two feet now. {A笑眯眯}<style=SizeSmall>I wonder if she'd be proud of me and tell me I did good...</style>
info: 云果小故事-百香果闲聊_云果故事线
